inner join T_PT_USER u on u.id = t.SENDER_ID left join T_PT_DEPT d on d.id = u.dept_id
mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS "id", t.approval_result AS "approvalResult", t.business_name AS "businessName", t.collaboration_dept AS "collaborationDept", t.header AS "header", t.start_tims AS "startTims", t.end_time AS "endTime", t.need_place AS "needPlace", t.explains AS "explains", t.funds AS "funds", t.SENDER_ID AS "senderId", d.name as "senderDeptName", u.name as "senderName", t.creater AS "creater", t.create_date AS "createDate", t.update_date AS "updateDate", t.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM T_AP_BUSINESS_LOG t inner join T_PT_USER u on u.id = t.SENDER_ID left join T_PT_DEPT d on d.id = u.dept_id WHERE t.DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag} and t.ID = #{id}

select t.id as "id", r.ID as "taskId", r.PRO_DEF_NAME as "processName", r.NAME as "taskName", u.name as "sender", t.CREATE_DATE as "time", t.business_name AS "businessName", t.header AS "header" from V_WF_RU_TASK r inner join T_AP_BUSINESS t on t.id = r.business_id inner join T_PT_USER u on u.id = t.sender_id
(r.ASSIGNEE = #{userId} or (r.ASSIGNEE is null and r.USER_ID = #{userId}))
AND t.business_name LIKE concat('%',#{business.businessName},'%')
order by t.CREATE_DATE desc

select t.id as "id", h.PROC_NAME as "processName", h.PROC_INST_ID as "processInstanceId", u.name as "sender", t.CREATE_DATE as "time", t.task_name as "taskName", t.business_name AS "businessName", t.header AS "header" from V_WF_HI_TASK h inner join T_AP_BUSINESS t on t.id = h.business_id inner join T_PT_USER u on u.id = t.sender_id
(h.ASSIGNEE = #{userId} and h.START_USER_ID <> #{userId})
AND t.business_name LIKE concat('%',#{business.businessName},'%')
AND u.name LIKE concat('%',#{business.senderName},'%')
order by t.CREATE_DATE desc

select DISTINCT t.id as "id", h.PROC_NAME as "processName", h.PROC_INST_ID as "processInstanceId", t.CREATE_DATE as "time", t.task_name as "taskName", t.business_name AS "businessName", t.header AS "header" from V_WF_HI_TASK h inner join T_AP_BUSINESS t on t.id = h.business_id
h.START_USER_ID = #{userId}
AND t.business_name LIKE concat('%',#{business.businessName},'%')
order by t.CREATE_DATE desc
SELECT APPROVAL_RESULT FROM T_AP_BUSINESS WHERE ID = #{id}
